item.title: CVS Worker Fatally Stabbed on Christmas Day on Long Island
item.description: A 23-year-old CVS employee was killed on Thursday in Lindenhurst, the authorities said. A person of interest has been identified.

item.title: Downpours Ease in Southern California, but Flood Risks Remain
item.description: Another wave of rain was hitting the Los Angeles area on Friday, adding to the record-setting precipitation over Christmas.

item.title: I Was the President’s Pardon Attorney. He’s Making a Mockery of the Pardon Process.
item.description: Anyone who wants to live in a safe, fair and free country should be alarmed.

item.title: Trump’s Claims About Nigeria Strike Belie a Complex Situation on the Ground
item.description: President Trump said the targets of airstrikes in Nigeria were Islamic State terrorists responsible for killing Christians, but experts question his f...

item.title: Michal Urbaniak, Pioneering Jazz Fusion Violinist, Dies at 82
item.description: One of the first jazz musicians from Poland to gain an international following, he recorded more than 60 albums and played with stars like Miles Davis...
